I should have put that I cannot reproduce the exception. The table does not 
redraw correctly when resizing the width of the dialog.

By "table does not redraw correctly" do you mean the flickering of the top few 
items in the Table?  I see this, but I don't see any other cheese.

No..I mean serious smeared cheese in the table :-) I will attempt to reproduce 
on the current machine and attach picture.

I cannot reproduce on WinXP on 20040303.
I do not have access to Win2000 today to try on that OS.
This is related to some of the changes that I made in Table recently.

The only way this could happen would be if getTopIndex() was returning a 
negative number.  This can happen because of bug #44245.  I have hacked SWT so 
that getTopIndex() can't return a negative number but this hack won't be 
necessary it we can ever fix #44245.

Darin, please reopen this bug report with a picture of the cheese if you can 
ever get it again.
